explains: adv. 秘密地；暗自感觉地，私底下地

sentences.en: She secretly nurtured a hope of becoming famous.
sentences.cn: 她暗暗滋生出成名的愿望。

sentences.en: The police had secretly filmed the conversations.
sentences.cn: 警察已秘密地把几次谈话拍摄下来。

sentences.en: His wife Marie secretly entered him for the championship.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子玛丽偷偷给他报名参加锦标赛。
